t: How to Define Your Brand’s Tone of Voice (+ Template)
s: July 14, 2022 - Designer News keeps things more serious with their 404 page. They add a touch of creativity, but keep the tone pretty dry: It’s good to be respectful to your audience, but you also don’t want to overdo it. You may not come across as genuine if you’re always pandering to your users.
